R

RanOutOfStockException - Exception in customExceptions
this class assigned to throw Exception when the coupon purchase progress failed for out of stock or expired date reason.
RanOutOfStockException(String) - Constructor for exception customExceptions.RanOutOfStockException
this constructor using Exception super class method to send out message and cause exception.
removeAll() - Method in class executeMain.Remover
This method actually will empty the DB.
removeCompany(Company) - Method in interface dbDAO.CompanyDAO
this an AbstractMethod that bound to remove company .
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class dbDAO.CompanyDBDAO
This method removing all the company records including coupons that exist even in a customer ownership.
removeCompany() - Method in class executeMain.Remover
This method will remove the specific company and it's coupons
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
this method gives instruction for CompanyDBDAOclass to remove a company from the DB.it receiving a company instance and conductor it to the removeCompany method in CompanyDBDAO class

this an AbstractMethod that bound to remove coupon .
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class dbDAO.CouponDBDAO
removeCoupon method is designed to remove coupon either by company or by the DailyCouponExpirationTask from all the tables in DB Coupon ,Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon.
removeCoupon() - Method in class executeMain.Remover
this method will remove this specific coupon from all tables in DB.
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
this method gives instruction for CouponDBDAOclass to remove a coupon from the DB.it receiving a coupon instance and conductor it to the removeCoupon method in CouponDBDAO class
